control.description: enable fullscreen visualization when music starts

onclick.condition: Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoWeatherButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoPicturesButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMovieButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMusicButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoProgramsButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoSystemButton)

Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoWeatherButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoPicturesButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoVideosButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMovieButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoTVShowButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoMusicButton) + Skin.HasSetting(HomeMenuNoProgramsButton)
